data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Maier, Crystal A., Short, Andrew Edward Z. (2014): Hexanchorus bifurcatus sp. nov., a new tepui riffle beetle (Coleoptera: Elmidae: Larainae) from Tafelberg, Suriname. Zootaxa 3895 (1): 137-143, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3895.1.9
